sentences.en: "In 10 out of 10 documented cases of violent alligator–drunkard encounters, the reptile was not influenced by the fact that the victim was 'just kidding' or 'just having some fun, '" McCrory said.
sentences.cn: “每10个记录在案的鳄鱼与醉汉暴力相向的案例中就有10个案列表明，尽管受害者'只是开个玩笑' 或者 '只是寻寻开心‘，鳄鱼的反应是不受这些友好本意影响的 ”麦克罗里说到。

sentences.en: A drunkard is unfit to drive.
A lot of wine has been drunk to that drunkard.
He became a skid row type of drunkard.
sentences.cn: 他变成了那种贫民区里常见的醉鬼。

sentences.en: He is a self - confessed drunkard.
Pay no attention to what that drunkard says.
sentences.cn: 你别介意那个酒鬼说的那些混话.

sentences.en: Seryozhka is a sluggard, a drunkard.
sentences.cn: 谢辽日卡是个懒汉, 酒鬼.

sentences.en: That drunkard flung out the empty bottle.
sentences.cn: 那个醉汉把空瓶扔了出来。

sentences.en: That drunkard was the opprobrium of our community.
sentences.cn: 那个酒鬼是我们社区里可耻的人物.

sentences.en: The drunkard began to rave again.
sentences.cn: 这酒鬼又开始胡言乱语了.

sentences.en: The drunkard led a vicious life.
sentences.cn: 这个醉汉过着堕落的生活.

sentences.en: The drunkard staggered along the street.
sentences.cn: 那醉汉趔趄着走在街上.

sentences.en: The drunkard told his troubles to every Tom , Dick and Harry who passed by.
sentences.cn: 不论张三李四,这个醉汉逢人就诉苦.

sentences.en: The drunkard tottered along the road.
The drunkard was walking in a roll.
The drunkard, blackguarded about the street till he got his head cut and his clothes torn.
sentences.cn: 那个醉汉在街头胡闹,一直闹到他的头受了伤,衣服也被撕破方才罢休.

trans.tran_en: A drunkard is someone who frequently gets drunk
